name: SUZUKI DEUTSCHLAND GMBH
memberOrga: Suzuki is a member of the following trade associations JAMA (http://www.jama.org), ACEM (http://www.acem.eu), IMEC(http://www.icomia.com).
goal:
Suzuki is a global producer of automobiles, motorcycles, outboard motors, ATVs and other products. As a group it is committed to promote "the production of small and sub-compact vehicles” and the “development of environmentally benign products" needed by customers. It pledges to be “small, less, light, short and beautiful” on every side of the organization, facilities, parts, environment and production.
For automotive the action is summed up by the slogan “small cars for a big future”.
interests: Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Initiatives relating to automotive, marine, environmental, and safety are followed.
